responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I assist you with?
Your attendance is available on the student portal.
Attendance records are updated weekly. You need 75% attendance to be eligible for exams.
Exam schedules are published one month before exams.
Check the university website or your department notice board for exam dates.
Fee deadlines are mentioned in the academic calendar.
You can pay fees through the online portal using credit card or net banking.
Course catalogs are available on the department website.
Register for courses through the student portal during the registration period.
Library is open from 8 AM to 8 PM on weekdays.
You need a student ID card to borrow books from the library.
Hostel admission forms are available at the hostel office.
Hostel fees vary depending on the room type and facilities.
